attributes.action: Repeal the decision to make smoking whilst driving a criminal offence.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Smokers are being villified enough in this country weather in public houses, public places or in doctors surgeries, but to now make it illegal to smoke at the wheel of your own car is too much.

The simple fact is that this is being made a crime simply because the police aren't catching the real dangerous drivers and smokers are seen as an easy target or scape-goat.

Why not, when a dangerous driver is caught, and  happens to be smoking at the time throw the book at them, but leave the law abiding, safe, and courteous smokers alone.
